Title: How to Develop Your Team Like a Navy SEAL Commander with Mike Hayes
Description:
Join us as I talk to Mike Hayes, former commanding officer of SEAL Team TWO and the current chief digital transformation officer at VMware. Mike explains what he does to build an organization that’s prepared to grow their people—and how you can do the same. Later in the episode, I chat with Brian Williams, the senior executive vice president of Ramsey+, about how you can develop a person by focusing on their strengths.

You’ll learn:

  • What a Navy SEAL commanding officer does daily
  • How to avoid fatal mistakes when delegating to direct reports
  • How failing to develop your team can cost you
  • How to identify and develop your team members’ strengths
